text.div:
Generated Narrative

url: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7dk/dk-medcom/

version: 0.1.0

name: receive-notification-correction

title: Correction: Patient is admitted but the hospital department registered is incorrect

status: active

date: 2021-10-22

publisher: MedCom

contact: MedCom: fhir@medcom.dk

copyright: MedCom 2021

Origins

-IndexProfile
*1FHIR Client

Destinations

-IndexProfile
*1FHIR Server

fixture

autocreate: false

autodelete: false

resource: /FHIRSandbox/MedCom/401-Hospitalnotification/receive/Userstory/_reference/resources/STIN_14.xml

fixture

autocreate: false

autodelete: false

resource: /FHIRSandbox/MedCom/401-Hospitalnotification/receive/Userstory/_reference/resources/RE_STIN_14.xml

fixture

autocreate: false

autodelete: false

resource: /FHIRSandbox/MedCom/401-Acknowledgement/_reference/resources/Acknowledgement-ok.xml

profile: http://medcomfhir.dk/fhir/core/1.0/StructureDefinition/medcom-hospitalNotification-message

variable

name: destinationUri

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).destination.endpoint

sourceId: bundle-create-STIN

variable

name: destinationUriREK1

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).destination.endpoint

sourceId: bundle-create-RE-STIN

variable

name: bundleResourceid0

expression: Bundle.id

sourceId: bundle-create-STIN

variable

name: MessageHeaderIdentifier0

expression: Bundle.entry[0].fullUrl

sourceId: bundle-create-STIN

variable

name: ProvenanceID0

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).id

sourceId: bundle-create-STIN

variable

name: bundleResourceid1

expression: Bundle.id

sourceId: bundle-create-RE-STIN

variable

name: MessageHeaderIdentifier1

expression: Bundle.entry[0].fullUrl

sourceId: bundle-create-RE-STIN

variable

name: ProvenanceID1

expression: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).id

sourceId: bundle-create-RE-STIN

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptEncodeRequestUrlParams

action

action

action

action

Operations

action

Asserts

*Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 201(Created).response201false

test

name: HospitalNotification-STIN

description: GET a Hospital notification. The expected response is a 200(OK) with a payload of the Hospital notification resource in XML format.

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptDestinationEncodeRequestUrlOriginParams
*ReadBundleReceive notification about admission -STINxml1true1?message.destination-uri=${destinationUri}

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionResponseCodeWarningOnly
*Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).response200false

test

name: 3 Post Acknowledgement-bundle-create-STIN

description: GET ACK

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptDestinationEncodeRequestUrlOriginSourceId
*CreateBundlePost a acknowledgementxml1true1bundle-create-ack-OK

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionResourceWarningOnly
*Confirm that the client request payload contains a Bundle resource type.requestBundlefalse

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionOperatorValueWarningOnly
*Confirm that the MessageHeader response code is OKrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).response.codeequalsokfalse

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the request resource contains the expected evetCoding code.requestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).event.as(Coding).select(code = 'acknowledgment-message').allTrue()false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the Bundle not containing a OperationOutcomerequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(OperationOutcome).exists().not()false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionOperatorValueWarningOnly
*Confirm that the MessageHeader.response.identifier is equal to Id of original message requestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).response.identifierequals${bundleResourceid0}false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the reference original Provenance.entity.what is equal to Id of original messageheader.identifierrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).where(entity.what.reference ='${MessageHeaderIdentifier0}')false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the there are two ProvenancesrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).count() = 2false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the id of the original message provenance exist in the ackrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).where(id='${ProvenanceID0}').exists()false

test

name: HospitalNotification-RE_STIN

description: GET a Hospital notification. The expected response is a 200(OK) with a payload of the Hospital notification resource in XML format.

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptDestinationEncodeRequestUrlOriginParams
*ReadBundleThe patient does not show up after ended leave -SLHJxml1true1?message.destination-uri=${destinationUriREK1}

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionResponseCodeWarningOnly
*Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).response200false

test

name: 4 Post Acknowledgement-bundle-create-RE-STIN

description: GET ACK

action

Operations

*CreateBundlePost a acknowledgementxml1true1bundle-create-ack-OK

action

action

Asserts

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the request resource contains the expected evetCoding code.requestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).event.as(Coding).select(code = 'acknowledgment-message').allTrue()false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the Bundle not containing a OperationOutcomerequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(OperationOutcome).exists().not()false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionOperatorValueWarningOnly
*Confirm that the MessageHeader.response.identifier is equal to Id of original message requestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(MessageHeader).response.identifierequals${bundleResourceid1}false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly
*Confirm that the reference original Provenance.entity.what is equal to Id of original messageheader.identifierrequestBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Provenance).where(entity.what.reference ='${MessageHeaderIdentifier1}')false

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionExpressionWarningOnly

action

Asserts
